GV05sirup_u:0: oṃ devā ha vai svargalokam āyaṃs te rudram apṛcchan ko bhavān iti /
GV05sirup_u:1: so 'bravīd aham ekaḥ prathamam āsodvartāmi ca bhaviṣyāmi ca nānyaḥ kaścin matto vyatirikta iti /
GV05sirup_u:2_0: so 'ntarād antaraṃ prāviśat diśaś cāntaraṃ prāviśat so 'haṃ nityānityo vyaktāvyakto
GV05sirup_u:2_1: brahmā brahmāhaṃ prāñcaḥ pratyañco 'haṃ dakṣiṇāṃ ca udañco 'ham adhaś cordhvaś cāhaṃ
GV05sirup_u:2_2: diśaś ca pratidiśaś cāhaṃ pumān apumān striyaś cāhaṃ sāvitry ahaṃ gāyatry ahaṃ triṣṭubjagatyanuṣṭup
GV05sirup_u:2_3: cāhaṃ chando 'haṃ satyo 'haṃ gārhapatyo dakṣiṇāgnir āhavanīyo 'haṃ gaur ahaṃ gaury
GV05sirup_u:2_4: aham ṛg ahaṃ yajur ahaṃ sāmāham atharvāṅgiraso 'haṃ jyeṣṭho 'haṃ śreṣṭho'haṃ variṣṭho
GV05sirup_u:2_5: 'ham āpo 'haṃ tejo 'haṃ guhyo 'ham araṇyo 'ham akṣaram ahaṃ kṣaram ahaṃ puṣkaram
GV05sirup_u:2_6: ahaṃ pavitram aham ugraṃ ca baliś ca purastāj jyotir ity aham eva sarvebhyo mām eva
GV05sirup_u:2_7: sa sarvaḥ samāyo māṃ veda sa devān veda sarvāṃś ca vedān sāṅgān api brahma brāhmaṇaiś
GV05sirup_u:2_8: ca gāṃ gobhir brāhmaṇān brāhmaṇyena havir haviṣā āyur āyuṣā satyena satyaṃ dharmeṇa
GV05sirup_u:3: tato ha vai te devā rudram apṛcchan te devā rudram apaśyan te devā rudram adhyāyan te devā ūrdhvabāhavo rudraṃ stuvanti // SirUp_1
GV05sirup_u:4: oṃ yo vai rudraḥ sa bhagavān yaś ca brahmā tasmai vai namonamaḥ // SirUp_2

GV05sirup_u:36_0: bhas te ādir madhyaṃ bhuvas te svas te śīrṣaṃ viśvarūpo 'si brahmaikas tvaṃ dvidhā
GV05sirup_u:36_1: tridhā vṛddhis tvaṃ śāntis tvaṃ puṣṭis tvaṃ hutam ahutaṃ dattam adattaṃ sarvam asarvaṃ
GV05sirup_u:36_2: viśvam aviśvaṃ kṛtam akṛtaṃ param aparaṃ parāyaṇaṃ ca tvam /
GV05sirup_u:37: apām asomam amṛtā abhūm āgan me jyotir avidāma devān /
GV05sirup_u:39: kim u dhūrtir amṛtaṃ martyasya somasūryapurastāt sūkṣmaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:40_0: sarvaṃ jagaddhitaṃ vā etad akṣaraṃ prājāpatyaṃ saumyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ puruṣaṃ grāhyam aguhyena
GV05sirup_u:40_1: bhāvaṃ bhāvena saumyaṃ saumyena sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmena vāyavyaṃ vāyavyena grasati tasmai
GV05sirup_u:41: hṛdisthā devatāḥ sarvā hṛdi prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GV05sirup_u:42: hṛdi tvam asi yo nityaṃ tisro mātrāḥ paras tu saḥ // SirUp_33
GV05sirup_u:43_0: tasyottarataḥ śirodakṣiṇataḥ pādau ya uttarataḥ sa oṃkāraḥ ya oṃkāraḥ sa praṇavaḥ
GV05sirup_u:43_1: yaḥ praṇavaḥ sa sarvavyāpī yaḥ sarvavyāpī so 'nantaḥ yo 'nantas tat tāraṃ yat tāraṃ
GV05sirup_u:43_2: tac chuklaṃ yac chuklaṃ tat sūkṣmaṃ yat sūkṣmaṃ tad vaidyutaṃ yad vaidyutaṃ tat paraṃ
GV05sirup_u:43_3: brahma yat paraṃ brahma sa ekaḥ yaḥ ekaḥ sa rudraḥ yo rudraḥ sa īśānaḥ ya īśānaḥ
GV05sirup_u:44: atha kasmād ucyate oṃkāraḥ yasmād uccāryamāṇa eva prāṇān ūrdhvam utkrāmayati tasmād ucyate oṃkāraḥ /
GV05sirup_u:45: atha kasmād ucyate praṇavaḥ yasmād uccāryamāṇa eva ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvāṅgirasaṃ brahma brāhmaṇebhyaḥ praṇāmayati nāmayati ca tasmād ucyate praṇavaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:46: atha kasmād ucyate sarvavyāpī yasmād uccāryamāṇa eva yathā snehena palalapiṇḍam iva śāntarūpam otaprotam anuprāpto vyatiṣaktaś ca tasmād ucyate sarvavyāpī /
GV05sirup_u:47: atha kasmād ucyate 'nantaḥ yasmād uccāryamāṇa eva tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc cāsyānto nopalabhyate tasmād ucyate 'nantaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:48: atha kasmād ucyate tāraṃ yasmād uccāryamāṇa eva garbhajanmavyādhijarāmaraṇasaṃsāramahābhayāt tārayati trāyate ca tasmād ucyate tāram /
GV05sirup_u:49: atha kasmād ucyate śuklaṃ yasmād uccāryamāṇa eva klandate klāmayati ca tasmād ucyate śuklam /
GV05sirup_u:50: atha kasmād ucyate sūkṣmaṃ yasmād uccāryamāṇa eva sūkṣmo bhūtvā śarīrāṇy adhitiṣṭhati sarvāṇi cāṅgāny abhimṛśati tasmād ucyate sūkṣmam /
GV05sirup_u:51: atha kasmād ucyate vaidyutaṃ yasmād uccāryamāṇa eva vyakte mahati tamasi dyotayati tasmād ucyate vaidyutam /
GV05sirup_u:52: atha kasmād ucyate paraṃ brahma yasmāt param aparaṃ parāyaṇaṃ ca bṛhad bṛhatyā bṛṃhayati tasmād ucyate paraṃ brahma /
GV05sirup_u:53_0: atha kasmād ucyate ekaḥ yaḥ sarvān prāṇān saṃbhakṣya saṃbhakṣaṇenājaḥ saṃsṛjati visṛjati
GV05sirup_u:53_1: tīrtham eke vrajanti tīrtham eke dakṣiṇāḥ pratyañca udañcaḥ prāñco 'bhivrajanty eke
GV05sirup_u:54: sākaṃ sa eko bhūtaś carati prajānāṃ tasmād ucyate ekaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:55: atha kasmād ucyate rudraḥ yasmād ṛṣibhir nānyair bhaktair drutam asya rūpam upalabhyate tasmād ucyate rudraḥ /
GV05sirup_u:56: atha kasmād ucyate īśānaḥ yaḥ sarvān devān īśate īśānībhir jananībhiś ca śaktibhiḥ /
GV05sirup_u:57: abhittvā śūraṇo numo dugdhā iva dhenavaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:58: īśānam asya jagataḥ svadarśam īśānam indratasthuṣa iti tasmād ucyate īśānaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:59_0: atha kasmād ucyate bhagavān maheśvaraḥ yasmād bhaktājñānena bhajaty anugṛhṇāti ca
GV05sirup_u:59_1: vācaṃ saṃsṛjati visṛjati ca sarvān bhāvān parityajyātmajñānena yogaiśvaryeṇa mahati
GV05sirup_u:59_2: mahīyate tasmād ucyate bhagavān maheśvaraḥ tad etad rudracaritam // SirUp_35
GV05sirup_u:60: eko ha devaḥ pradiśo 'nu sarvāḥ pūrvo ha jātaḥ sa u garbha antaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:61: sa eva jātaḥ sa janiṣyamāṇaḥ pratyaṅjanās tiṣṭhati sarvatomukhaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:62: eko rudro na dvitīyāya tasmai ya imāṃl lokān īśata īśānībhiḥ /
GV05sirup_u:63: pratyaṅjanās tiṣṭhati saṃcukocāntakāle saṃsṛjya viśvā bhuvanāni goptā /
GV05sirup_u:64: yo yoniṃ yonim adhitiṣṭhaty eko yenedaṃ sarvaṃ vicarati sarvam /
GV05sirup_u:65: tam īśānaṃ varadaṃ devam īḍyaṃ nicāyyemāṃ śāntim atyantam eti /
GV05sirup_u:66: kṣamāṃ hitvā hetujālasya mūlaṃ buddhyā saṃcitaṃ sthāpayitvā tu rudro rudram ekatvam āhuḥ /
GV05sirup_u:67: śāśvataṃ vai purāṇam iṣam ūrjeṇa paśavo 'nunāmayantaṃ mṛtyupāśān /
GV05sirup_u:68: tad etenātmann etenārdhacaturthena mātreṇa śāntiṃ saṃsṛjati paśupāśavimokṣaṇam yā sā prathamā mātrā brahmadevatyā raktā varṇena yas tāṃ dhyāyate nityaṃ sa gacched brahmapadam /
GV05sirup_u:69: yā sā dvitīyā mātrā viṣṇudevatyā kṛṣṇā varṇena yas tāṃ dhyāyate nityaṃ sa gacched vaiṣṇavaṃ padam /
GV05sirup_u:70: yā sā tṛtīyā mātrā īśānadevatyā kapilā varṇena yas tāṃ dhyāyate nityaṃ sa gacched aiśānaṃ padam /
GV05sirup_u:71: yā sārdhacaturthī mātrā sarvadevatyāvyaktībhūtā khaṃ vicarati śuddhā sphaṭikasaṃnibhā varṇena yas tāṃ dhyāyate nityaṃ sa gacchet padam anāmayam /
GV05sirup_u:72: tad etad upāsīta munayo vāgvadanti na tasya grahaṇam ayaṃ panthā vihita uttareṇa yena devā yānti yena pitaro yena ṛṣayaḥ param aparaṃ parāyaṇaṃ ceti // SirUp_36
GV05sirup_u:73: bālāgramātraṃ hṛdayasya madhye viśvaṃ devaṃ jātarūpaṃ vareṇyam /
GV05sirup_u:74: tam ātmasthaṃ ye tu paśyanti dhīrās teṣāṃ śāntir bhavati netareṣām // SirUp_37
GV05sirup_u:75: yasmin krodhaṃ yāṃ ca tṛṣṇāṃ kṣamāṃ cākṣamāṃ hitvā hetujālasya mūlam /
GV05sirup_u:76: buddhyā saṃcitaṃ sthāpayitvā tu rudre rudram ekatvam āhuḥ // SirUp_38
GV05sirup_u:77_0: rudro hi śāśvatena vai purāṇeneṣam ūrjeṇa tapasā niyantāgnir iti bhasma vāyar iti
GV05sirup_u:77_1: bhasma jalam iti bhasma sthalam iti bhasma vyomam iti bhasma sarvaṃ ha vā idaṃ bhasma
GV05sirup_u:77_2: mana etāni cakṣūṃṣi yasmād vratam idaṃ pāśupataṃ yad bhasmanāṅgāni saṃspṛśet tasmād
GV05sirup_u:77_3: brahma tad etat pāśupataṃ paśupāśavimokṣaṇāya // SirUp_39
GV05sirup_u:78: yo 'gnau rudro yo 'psv antar ya oṣadhīr vīrudha āviveśa /
GV05sirup_u:79: ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni caklape tasmai rudrāya namo 'stv agnaye /
GV05sirup_u:80: yo rudro 'gnau yo rudro 'psv antar yo rudra oṣadhīr vīrudha āviveśa /
GV05sirup_u:81: yo rudra imā viśvā bhuvanāni caklape tasmai rudrāya namonamaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:82: yo rudro 'psu yo rudra oṣadhiṣu yo rudro vanaspatiṣu /
GV05sirup_u:83: yena rudreṇa jagad ūrdhvaṃ dhāritaṃ pṛthivī dvidhā tridhā dhartā dhāritā nāgā ye 'ntarikṣe tasmai rudrāya vai namonamaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:84: mūrdhānam asya saṃsevyāpy atharvā hṛdayaṃ ca yat /
GV05sirup_u:86: tad vā atharvaṇaḥ śiro devakośaḥ samujjhitaḥ /
GV05sirup_u:88: na ca divo devajanena guptā na cāntarikṣāṇi na ca bhūma imāḥ yasminn idaṃ sarvam otaprotaṃ tasmād anyaṃ na paraṃ kiṃca nāsti // SirUp_41
GV05sirup_u:89: na tasmāt pūrvaṃ na paraṃ tad asti na bhūtaṃ nota bhavyaṃ yad āsīt /
GV05sirup_u:90: sahasrapād ekamūrdhnā vyāptaṃ sa evedam āvarīvartti bhūtam // SirUp_42
GV05sirup_u:91: akṣarāt saṃjāyate kālaḥ kālād vyāpaka ucyate // SirUp_43
GV05sirup_u:92: vyāpako hi bhagavān rudro bhogāyamāno yadā śete rudras tadā saṃhāryyate prajāḥ /
GV05sirup_u:93_0: ucchvasite tamo bhavati tamasa āpo 'psv aṅgulyā mathite mathitaṃ śiśire śiśiraṃ mathyamānaṃ
GV05sirup_u:93_1: phenaṃ bhavati phenād aṇḍaṃ bhavaty aṇḍād brahmā bhavati brahmaṇo vāyuḥ vāyor oṃkāraḥ
GV05sirup_u:93_2: oṃkārāt sāvitrī sāvitryā gāyatrī gāyatryā lokā bhavanti /
GV05sirup_u:94: arcayanti tapaḥ satyaṃ madhu kṣaranti yad dhruvam /
GV05sirup_u:96: āpo jyotī raso 'mṛtaṃ brahma bhūr bhuvaḥ svar oṃ nama iti // SirUp_44
GV05sirup_u:97_0: ya idam atharvaśiro brāhmaṇo 'dhīte aśrotriyaḥ śrotriyo bhavati anupanīta upanīto
GV05sirup_u:97_1: bhavati so 'gnipūto bhavati sa vāyupūto bhavati sa sūryapūto bhavati sa somapūto
GV05sirup_u:97_2: bhavati sa satyapūto bhavati sa sarvair devair jñāto bhavati sa sarvair vedair anudhyāto
GV05sirup_u:97_3: bhavati sa sarveṣu tīrtheṣu snāto bhavati tena sarvaiḥ kratubhir iṣṭaṃ bhavati gāyatryāḥ
GV05sirup_u:97_4: ṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi japtāni bhavanti itihāsapurāṇānāṃ rudrāṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi japtāni bhavanti /
GV05sirup_u:100: ā saptamāt puruṣayugān punātīty āha bhagavān atharvaśiraḥ sakṛj japtvaiva śuciḥ sa pūtaḥ karmaṇyo bhavati /
GV05sirup_u:102: tṛtīyaṃ japtvaivam evānupraviśaty oṃ satyam oṃ satyam oṃ satyam /
